Distribution. Laporte (1840) described the species from “Luzon (Manille)”. The species is widely distributed in the Philippines (Luzon, Polillo, Sibuyan, Masbate, Leyte, Negros, Dinagat, Mindanao) and Indonesia (Sulawesi, Ulu Siav, Tagavlandang) according to Itoh (1993). The species is newly recorded here from the Philippines islands of Isabela (Northern Luzon), Bulacan (Central Luzon), Cavite, Laguna, Batangas (Southern Luzon), Albay (South- eastern Luzon) and from the islands of Catanduanes (Quezon, Luzon), Iloilo (Visayas) and Basilan (Mindanao).
